Posts.Content: Hello. I am new to this side . I am 55 yrs old in Oct 2018 was diagnosed with grade 3/3 invasive ductal C. They are also sign of cancer in the liver. Started herceptin prejetta and taxotere. After 3 months of chemo the latest ct scan shows there is a lession in the thoracic area of the spine. Had a shot of xgeva at my last chemo . gone see my oncologist in 2 weeks . i thought being on prejetta herceptin should stop metastasis . anyones input please would be helpful. Thanks and God bless us all
